short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss out on points again. With the extension you’ll get points alerts while you shop, plus get coupons applied at checkout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Activate points directly from 1,000+ stores while you shop online. With the Southwest Airlines Rapid Rewards Shopping® button browser extension you’ll:

🛍️ Get easy-to-activate reminders: The button lets you know when to activate and earn points as you shop at more than 1,000 stores.

💰 Enjoy savings at your fingertips: Shop savvier with coupon codes that are automatically applied at checkout.

⚖️ Compare points offers: Shop and earn with confidence thanks to Google search results that clearly display stores’ points offers.

👀 See what else you can earn: Enjoy easy access to earning opportunities like extra points, bonus offers, and more.

❤️ Let the points you love come to you: Get the Rapid Rewards Shopping button browser extension now and get rewarded every time you shop.

By installing the Rapid Rewards Shopping button, you are agreeing to these terms & conditions: 
https://rapidrewardsshopping.southwest.com/eula____.htm

Privacy Policy: https://www.southwest.com/about-southwest/terms-and-conditions/privacy-policy/
